item.title: Helltrain - My favorite band nobody knows
item.description:
I initially intended to post a few songs on Mastodon and talk about my history with Helltrain, but I quickly learned that this would be better suited to a blog post. So here we are…

I’ve had Helltrain stuck in my ears for about a week. In particular this morning the chorus to Route 666 was stuck on repeat, so I tortured my kids with a bit of “Dad music” while prepping breakfast. üòÅ
